description: The GANYMEDE project, is a budgetary tool, focus to simplify project monitoring, and more specifically to carry out budgetary monitoring.
Total Transports specializes in road transport, offers services for both individuals and professionals. Moving, transport of goods, and delivery of parcels.
I realized for a school project an FTP(File Transfer Protocol) and an IRC(Internet Relay Chat) server in C language.
With a group, we made a cross-platform 3D Bomberman video game in C++ using the irrlicht libraries.
I realized a dashboard with nodeJS - Docker.
I recreated the Strace linux command in C.
